verses.arabic_text: ٱقۡتَرَبَتِ ٱلسَّاعَةُ وَٱنشَقَّ ٱلۡقَمَرُ
verses.translation: (1) The Hour has come near, and the moon has split [in two].[1577]

verses.arabic_text: وَإِن يَرَوۡاْ ءَايَةٗ يُعۡرِضُواْ وَيَقُولُواْ سِحۡرٞ مُّسۡتَمِرّٞ
verses.translation: (2) And if they see a sign [i.e., miracle], they turn away and say, "Passing magic."[1578]

verses.arabic_text: وَكَذَّبُواْ وَٱتَّبَعُوٓاْ أَهۡوَآءَهُمۡۚ وَكُلُّ أَمۡرٖ مُّسۡتَقِرّٞ
verses.translation: (3) And they denied and followed their inclinations. But for every matter is a [time of] settlement.

verses.arabic_text: وَلَقَدۡ جَآءَهُم مِّنَ ٱلۡأَنۢبَآءِ مَا فِيهِ مُزۡدَجَرٌ
verses.translation: (4) And there has already come to them of information that in which there is deterrence.

verses.arabic_text: حِكۡمَةُۢ بَٰلِغَةٞۖ فَمَا تُغۡنِ ٱلنُّذُرُ
verses.translation: (5) Extensive wisdom - but warning does not avail [them].

verses.arabic_text: فَتَوَلَّ عَنۡهُمۡۘ يَوۡمَ يَدۡعُ ٱلدَّاعِ إِلَىٰ شَيۡءٖ نُّكُرٍ
verses.translation: (6) So leave them, [O Muḥammad]. The Day the Caller[1579] calls to something forbidding,

verses.arabic_text: خُشَّعًا أَبۡصَٰرُهُمۡ يَخۡرُجُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡأَجۡدَاثِ كَأَنَّهُمۡ جَرَادٞ مُّنتَشِرٞ
verses.translation: (7) Their eyes humbled, they will emerge from the graves as if they were locusts spreading,

verses.arabic_text: مُّهۡطِعِينَ إِلَى ٱلدَّاعِۖ يَقُولُ ٱلۡكَٰفِرُونَ هَٰذَا يَوۡمٌ عَسِرٞ
verses.translation: (8) Racing ahead toward the Caller. The disbelievers will say, "This is a difficult Day."

verses.arabic_text: ۞ كَذَّبَتۡ قَبۡلَهُمۡ قَوۡمُ نُوحٖ فَكَذَّبُواْ عَبۡدَنَا وَقَالُواْ مَجۡنُونٞ وَٱزۡدُجِرَ
verses.translation: (9) The people of Noah denied before them, and they denied Our servant and said, "A madman," and he was repelled.

verses.arabic_text: فَدَعَا رَبَّهُۥٓ أَنِّي مَغۡلُوبٞ فَٱنتَصِرۡ
verses.translation: (10) So he invoked his Lord, "Indeed, I am overpowered, so help."

verses.arabic_text: فَفَتَحۡنَآ أَبۡوَٰبَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ بِمَآءٖ مُّنۡهَمِرٖ
verses.translation: (11) Then We opened the gates of the heaven with rain pouring down

verses.arabic_text: وَفَجَّرۡنَا ٱلۡأَرۡضَ عُيُونٗا فَٱلۡتَقَى ٱلۡمَآءُ عَلَىٰٓ أَمۡرٖ قَدۡ قُدِرَ
verses.translation: (12) And caused the earth to burst with springs, and the waters met for a matter already predestined.

verses.arabic_text: وَحَمَلۡنَٰهُ عَلَىٰ ذَاتِ أَلۡوَٰحٖ وَدُسُرٖ
verses.translation: (13) And We carried him on a [construction of] planks and nails,

verses.arabic_text: تَجۡرِي بِأَعۡيُنِنَا جَزَآءٗ لِّمَن كَانَ كُفِرَ
verses.translation: (14) Sailing under Our observation as reward for he who had been denied.

verses.arabic_text: وَلَقَد تَّرَكۡنَٰهَآ ءَايَةٗ فَهَلۡ مِن مُّدَّكِرٖ
verses.translation: (15) And We left it as a sign, so is there any who will remember?

verses.arabic_text: فَكَيۡفَ كَانَ عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ
verses.translation: (16) And how [severe] were My punishment and warning.[1580]

verses.arabic_text: وَلَقَدۡ يَسَّرۡنَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ لِلذِّكۡرِ فَهَلۡ مِن مُّدَّكِرٖ
verses.translation: (17) And We have certainly made the Qur’ān easy for remembrance, so is there any who will remember?

verses.arabic_text: كَذَّبَتۡ عَادٞ فَكَيۡفَ كَانَ عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ
verses.translation: (18) ʿAad denied; and how [severe] were My punishment and warning.

verses.arabic_text: إِنَّآ أَرۡسَلۡنَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ رِيحٗا صَرۡصَرٗا فِي يَوۡمِ نَحۡسٖ مُّسۡتَمِرّٖ
verses.translation: (19) Indeed, We sent upon them a screaming wind on a day of continuous misfortune,

verses.arabic_text: تَنزِعُ ٱلنَّاسَ كَأَنَّهُمۡ أَعۡجَازُ نَخۡلٖ مُّنقَعِرٖ
verses.translation: (20) Extracting the people[1581] as if they were trunks of palm trees uprooted.

verses.arabic_text: فَكَيۡفَ كَانَ عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ
verses.translation: (21) And how [severe] were My punishment and warning.

verses.arabic_text: وَلَقَدۡ يَسَّرۡنَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ لِلذِّكۡرِ فَهَلۡ مِن مُّدَّكِرٖ
verses.translation: (22) And We have certainly made the Qur’ān easy for remembrance, so is there any who will remember?

verses.arabic_text: كَذَّبَتۡ ثَمُودُ بِٱلنُّذُرِ
verses.translation: (23) Thamūd denied the warning.

verses.arabic_text: فَقَالُوٓاْ أَبَشَرٗا مِّنَّا وَٰحِدٗا نَّتَّبِعُهُۥٓ إِنَّآ إِذٗا لَّفِي ضَلَٰلٖ وَسُعُرٍ
verses.translation: (24) And said, "Is it one human being[1582] among us that we should follow? Indeed, we would then be in error and madness.

verses.arabic_text: أَءُلۡقِيَ ٱلذِّكۡرُ عَلَيۡهِ مِنۢ بَيۡنِنَا بَلۡ هُوَ كَذَّابٌ أَشِرٞ
verses.translation: (25) Has the message been sent down upon him from among us? Rather, he is an insolent liar."

verses.arabic_text: سَيَعۡلَمُونَ غَدٗا مَّنِ ٱلۡكَذَّابُ ٱلۡأَشِرُ
verses.translation: (26) They will know tomorrow who is the insolent liar.

verses.arabic_text: إِنَّا مُرۡسِلُواْ ٱلنَّاقَةِ فِتۡنَةٗ لَّهُمۡ فَٱرۡتَقِبۡهُمۡ وَٱصۡطَبِرۡ
verses.translation: (27) Indeed, We are sending the she-camel as trial for them, so watch them and be patient.[1583]

verses.arabic_text: وَنَبِّئۡهُمۡ أَنَّ ٱلۡمَآءَ قِسۡمَةُۢ بَيۡنَهُمۡۖ كُلُّ شِرۡبٖ مُّحۡتَضَرٞ
verses.translation: (28) And inform them that the water is shared between them,[1584] each [day of] drink attended [by turn].

verses.arabic_text: فَنَادَوۡاْ صَاحِبَهُمۡ فَتَعَاطَىٰ فَعَقَرَ
verses.translation: (29) But they called their companion,[1585] and he dared[1586] and hamstrung [her].

verses.arabic_text: فَكَيۡفَ كَانَ عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ
verses.translation: (30) And how [severe] were My punishment and warning.

verses.arabic_text: إِنَّآ أَرۡسَلۡنَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ صَيۡحَةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗ فَكَانُواْ كَهَشِيمِ ٱلۡمُحۡتَظِرِ
verses.translation: (31) Indeed, We sent upon them one shriek [i.e., blast from the sky], and they became like the dry twig fragments of an [animal] pen.

verses.arabic_text: وَلَقَدۡ يَسَّرۡنَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ لِلذِّكۡرِ فَهَلۡ مِن مُّدَّكِرٖ
verses.translation: (32) And We have certainly made the Qur’ān easy for remembrance, so is there any who will remember?

verses.arabic_text: كَذَّبَتۡ قَوۡمُ لُوطِۭ بِٱلنُّذُرِ
verses.translation: (33) The people of Lot denied the warning.

verses.arabic_text: إِنَّآ أَرۡسَلۡنَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ حَاصِبًا إِلَّآ ءَالَ لُوطٖۖ نَّجَّيۡنَٰهُم بِسَحَرٖ
verses.translation: (34) Indeed, We sent upon them a storm of stones, except the family of Lot - We saved them before dawn.

verses.arabic_text: نِّعۡمَةٗ مِّنۡ عِندِنَاۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِي مَن شَكَرَ
verses.translation: (35) As favor from Us. Thus do We reward he who is grateful.

verses.arabic_text: وَلَقَدۡ أَنذَرَهُم بَطۡشَتَنَا فَتَمَارَوۡاْ بِٱلنُّذُرِ
verses.translation: (36) And he had already warned them of Our assault, but they disputed the warning.

verses.arabic_text: وَلَقَدۡ رَٰوَدُوهُ عَن ضَيۡفِهِۦ فَطَمَسۡنَآ أَعۡيُنَهُمۡ فَذُوقُواْ عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ
verses.translation: (37) And they had demanded from him his guests, but We obliterated their eyes, [saying], "Taste My punishment and warning."

verses.arabic_text: وَلَقَدۡ صَبَّحَهُم بُكۡرَةً عَذَابٞ مُّسۡتَقِرّٞ
verses.translation: (38) And there came upon them by morning an abiding punishment.

verses.arabic_text: فَذُوقُواْ عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ
verses.translation: (39) So taste My punishment and warning.

verses.arabic_text: وَلَقَدۡ يَسَّرۡنَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ لِلذِّكۡرِ فَهَلۡ مِن مُّدَّكِرٖ
verses.translation: (40) And We have certainly made the Qur’ān easy for remembrance, so is there any who will remember?

verses.arabic_text: وَلَقَدۡ جَآءَ ءَالَ فِرۡعَوۡنَ ٱلنُّذُرُ
verses.translation: (41) And there certainly came to the people of Pharaoh warning.

verses.arabic_text: كَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا كُلِّهَا فَأَخَذۡنَٰهُمۡ أَخۡذَ عَزِيزٖ مُّقۡتَدِرٍ
verses.translation: (42) They denied Our signs, all of them, so We seized them with a seizure of one Exalted in Might and Perfect in Ability.

verses.arabic_text: أَكُفَّارُكُمۡ خَيۡرٞ مِّنۡ أُوْلَٰٓئِكُمۡ أَمۡ لَكُم بَرَآءَةٞ فِي ٱلزُّبُرِ
verses.translation: (43) Are your disbelievers better than those [former ones], or have you immunity in the scriptures?

verses.arabic_text: أَمۡ يَقُولُونَ نَحۡنُ جَمِيعٞ مُّنتَصِرٞ
verses.translation: (44) Or do they say, "We are an assembly supporting [each other]"?

verses.arabic_text: سَيُهۡزَمُ ٱلۡجَمۡعُ وَيُوَلُّونَ ٱلدُّبُرَ
verses.translation: (45) [Their] assembly will be defeated, and they will turn their backs [in retreat].[1587]

verses.arabic_text: بَلِ ٱلسَّاعَةُ مَوۡعِدُهُمۡ وَٱلسَّاعَةُ أَدۡهَىٰ وَأَمَرُّ
verses.translation: (46) But the Hour is their appointment [for due punishment], and the Hour is more disastrous and more bitter.

verses.arabic_text: إِنَّ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ فِي ضَلَٰلٖ وَسُعُرٖ
verses.translation: (47) Indeed, the criminals are in error and madness.[1588].

verses.arabic_text: يَوۡمَ يُسۡحَبُونَ فِي ٱلنَّارِ عَلَىٰ وُجُوهِهِمۡ ذُوقُواْ مَسَّ سَقَرَ
verses.translation: (48) The Day they are dragged into the Fire on their faces [it will be said], "Taste the touch of Saqar."[1589]

verses.arabic_text: إِنَّا كُلَّ شَيۡءٍ خَلَقۡنَٰهُ بِقَدَرٖ
verses.translation: (49) Indeed, all things We created with predestination.

verses.arabic_text: وَمَآ أَمۡرُنَآ إِلَّا وَٰحِدَةٞ كَلَمۡحِۭ بِٱلۡبَصَرِ
verses.translation: (50) And Our command is but one, like a glance of the eye.

verses.arabic_text: وَلَقَدۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَآ أَشۡيَاعَكُمۡ فَهَلۡ مِن مُّدَّكِرٖ
verses.translation: (51) And We have already destroyed your kinds,[1590] so is there any who will remember?

verses.arabic_text: وَكُلُّ شَيۡءٖ فَعَلُوهُ فِي ٱلزُّبُرِ
verses.translation: (52) And everything they did is in written records.

verses.arabic_text: وَكُلُّ صَغِيرٖ وَكَبِيرٖ مُّسۡتَطَرٌ
verses.translation: (53) And every small and great [thing] is inscribed.

verses.arabic_text: إِنَّ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ فِي جَنَّٰتٖ وَنَهَرٖ
verses.translation: (54) Indeed, the righteous will be among gardens and rivers,

verses.arabic_text: فِي مَقۡعَدِ صِدۡقٍ عِندَ مَلِيكٖ مُّقۡتَدِرِۭ
verses.translation: (55) In a seat of honor near a Sovereign, Perfect in Ability.[1591]
